a.title:
Due to the result of our community's current situation regarding COVID-19, logistical issues and concerns about traffic has caused Second Harvest Food Bank to move the location of the May 7 Southview Middle School Pantry to Oakwood Park, located at 2047 E 36th St, Lorain. The pantry is tentatively scheduled from 4-6 p.m., but may change to earlier in the day, per Second Harvest Food Bank. Please check back for an updated time. 

Second Harvest will still be distributing FREE boxes of assorted shelf-stable food and more at this pantry!

•Please remain in your vehicle.
•Food will only be placed in the trunk of your vehicle.
•Food cannot be placed in the front or back seat area.
•Please ensure trunk space is clean and clear of other items.
•If the trunk is not clean, you will be asked to pull off and can only return to the line once the trunk is empty.

Please be mindful of your own health and the well-being of others.

PLEASE DO NOT ATTEND IF YOU ARE NOT FEELING WELL!

Send a healthy neighbor, friend, or family member!

Location: Oakwood Park, 2047 E 36th St., Lorain Starting at: 4:00 PM Ending at: 6:00 PM

h3.a: LOCATION CHANGE! Southview Middle School Pantry Program NOW At Oakwood Park

ogistical issues and concerns about traffic has caused Second Harvest Food Bank to move the location of the May 7 Southview Middle School Pantry to Oakwood Park, located at

a.title:
Let us help you meet the needs of your family. Free food for ALL scholars, families, & surrounding communities! Fresh produce, protein, bread, milk, and more!
For safety on school property, please do not line up before the start of the event.
*Proper ID or proof of residency required. Location: General Johnnie Wilson, 2700 Washington Avenue, Lorain Starting at: 4:00 PM Ending at: 6:00 PM
